channel.title: 600+ servers suck - discuss
channel.description:
Why bother with RSPS if the server you're making is going to be 600+? You might as well go play Runescape. I thought RSPS was created because of two reasons. 1. People wanted free Membership. 2. People wanted to relive the glory days.
Since 600+ servers are so underdeveloped, they have maybe 40% of actual Member's content, and there's no way to relive any glory days with them unless you joined yesterday.
That's my two cents. Opinions? I want an nice, mature debate/argument. Not a flame war -.-

I don’t understand how any if can discuss this… Its more a rant. Locked.

item.title: 600+ servers suck - discuss
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

  1. People want to get items they couldn’t normally get
  2. People want to make money
  3. People want a change
  4. People enjoy the fast leveling
  5. People enjoy programming
  6. People want to test bots (old reason)

And many, many more.

Read full topic
